ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record all abnormal findings for the given body system in the space provided.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PEORRES
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. May be used to populate a value into the SDTMIG variable PEORRES. If PERES = "Normal", populate PEORRES with the value of PERES. If PERES = "Abnormal", populate PEORRES with the value of PEDESC.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the examined body system is normal then the value in PEORRES should be "NORMAL". If the body system is not examined, then the value in PEORRES should be Null and the value in PESTAT should be "NOT DONE". If the examined body system is abnormal, then the value of PEORRES should contain the text of the abnormal findings (PEDESC). If the sponsor's data collection system allows for up front recording of the abnormality and status using a single variable then the SDTM variable name PEORRES may be used in place of CDASH variable names PERES and PEDESC.
